DOC.brief_summary: Prospective, observational cohort study of peripheral T cell lymphoma. Purpose is to investigate the complication including febrile neutropenia in the era of pegylated G-CSF prophylaxis.
DOC.brief_title: Cohort of Peripheral T Cell Lymphoma
DOC.detailed_description: Prospective evaluation of frequencies of febrile neutropenia or infectious complications in a homogeneous population of patients with peripheral T cell lymphoma
